alert.note: Alert for Carter; Jefferson; Love (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 8:54PM CDT until May 06 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Northwestern Love County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 854 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Stoneburg, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wilson, Ringling, Ryan, Terral, Grady, Oscar, Cornish, Courtney, and Petersburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging wind and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
